title: Data Center Silicon Platform Integration Engineering Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, resourceful people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple Hardware products. The same passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our dedication to leave the world better than we found it. Do you want join us in these pursuits? Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple products!
description: As a Platform Integration EPM, you will apply your technical savvy to partner with the key decision makers across multi-functional teams. Drive consistent weekly forums where multi-functional teams will highlight issues/blockers/risks and propose paths of mitigations and work behind/before/after the scenes to ensure issues brought into the forums for discussions are kept consistent, are of high benefit and getting the attention to converge to a solution. Gather information from the various teams involved through the concept stage of the SoCs, understand the multitude of platforms they are crafted for, the architectural trade offs made, and the gaps that were aligned at the initial definition stage. Work with onboarding teams to ensure the intent at the concept/definition stages propagates seamlessly from SoC concept to Product Architecture to Product Ship. Collaborate closely with Platform/System Architects to understand product/feature choices/trade offs and manage platform integration efforts/issue-resolution.
preferred_qualifications:
Prior hands on experience as an Engineer and/or EPM for Data Centers.
Knowledge on the client workloads and how this connects them both in a pre-silicon or post-silicon environment.
Ability to thrive in an ambiguous environment and emerge with process that are deemed valuable, needed and remain consistent.
Top notch critical thinking abilities and strong networking skills are essential to be successful within Apple.
Outstanding multi-tasking abilities with the ability to react to resets and changes in a time sensitive environment.
